original_title: Pinatta's View: Trip to the Dentist
overview: Children & Family, Education & Guidance - Join Pinatta and a group of her closest puppet friends as they lead a preschooler and her mom on an entertaining trip to the dentist's office, where they learn about the importance of dental hygiene and what to expect during a routine checkup. Comical skits, catchy songs and cool characters will help your children relax and overcome any fears they may have about seeing a dentist for the first time.
title: Pinatta's View: Trip to the Dentist
